QuestData.Title: The Element of Supplies
QuestData.Description: You'll notice that we're slightly ill prepared for battle.$B$BThe tol'vir tribes had never seen any sort of major confrontation for thousands of years.$B$BAll the combat protocols that the titans programmed into our ancestors are still there, though. Some are part of our instincts, some get passed on as tradition.$B$BBut none of this can compensate for lack of supplies. We need weapons. We need armor.$B$BThe best armor is lined with the skin of the riverbed crocolisks nearby. Help us gather some.
QuestData.CompletionText: I am glad to see you don't think you're above this sort of task.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job, $n. You might not think this adds up to much, but this might very well be the difference between life and death to one of our soldiers.
